thread.title: BRIEF-Public Bank Bhd Posts Qtrly Net Profit Of 1.49 Bln RGT

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Public Bank Bhd Posts Qtrly Net Profit Of 1.49 Bln RGT
text:
Feb 22 (Reuters) - Public Bank Bhd:
* ‍QTRLY REVENUE 5.35 BILLION RGT * QTRLY NET PROFIT 1.49 BILLION RGT ‍​ * ‍YEAR AGO QTRLY REVENUE 5.08 BILLION RGT, YEAR AGO QTRLY NET PROFIT 1.48 BILLION RGT
* DECLARES SECOND INTERIM DIVIDEND OF 34.0 SEN PER SHARE FOR FY ENDED DEC 31, 2017
* COMMON EQUITY TIER 1 CAPITAL RATIO STOOD AT 12.2% AT THE END OF 2017, AFTER DEDUCTING SECOND INTERIM DIVIDEND ‍​ Source text : ( bit.ly/2Cba44J ) Further company coverage:
